description: [KOCTOPUS](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0669) will attempt to delete or disable all Registry keys and scheduled tasks related to Microsoft Security Defender and Security Essentials.(Citation: MalwareBytes LazyScripter Feb 2021)

external_references.description: Jazi, H. (2021, February). LazyScripter: From Empire to double RAT. Retrieved November 24, 2021.
